text:
Couldn’t think of a better way to celebrate #Easter in 2021 than by getting the first dose of the #Pfizer vaccine! Thank you @LeahClarkVA for helping me get scheduled! I’ve never been so excited to get a shot! One down, one to go!🙏💪💉

#HappyEaster #COVID19 #Vaccine #PfizerGang https://t.co/NbNNRKIpCo
